devdoc.author: Peeramid Labs, 2024
devdoc.details: Implements core game functionality, ERC token receivers, and reentrancy protection

canEndTurn(uint256).details: Returns whether the turn can be ended early for the game with the specified ID

returns._0: bool Whether the turn can be ended early

canStartGame(uint256).details: Returns whether the game with the specified ID can be started early

returns._0: bool Whether the game can be started early

cancelGame(uint256).details: Cancels a game with the provided game ID. `gameId` is the ID of the game.

createGame((uint256,uint256,uint256,uint.details: External function to create a new game

params.params: Input parameters for creating a new game

estimateGamePrice(uint128).details: Estimates the price of a game with the specified minimum game time

returns._0: uint256 The estimated price of the game

gameCreator(uint256).details: Returns the creator of the game with the specified ID

returns._0: address The creator of the game

getContractState().details: Returns the current state of the contract

returns._0: LibRankify.InstanceState The current state of the contract

getGM(uint256).details: Returns the game master of the game with the specified ID

returns._0: address The game master of the game

getGameRank(uint256).details: Returns the rank of the game with the specified ID

returns._0: uint256 The rank of the game

getPlayerVotedArray(uint256).details: Returns the voted array for the game with the specified ID

getPlayers(uint256).details: Returns the players in the game with the specified ID

returns._0: address[] The players in the game

getPlayersGame(address).details: Returns the game ID of the game that the specified player is in

returns._0: uint256 The ID of the game

getPlayersMoved(uint256).details: Returns the players who have moved in the game with the specified ID

returns._0: bool[] The players who have moved
returns._1: uint256 The number of players who have moved

getScores(uint256).details: Returns the scores of the game with the specified ID

returns._0: address[] The players in the game
returns._1: uint256[] The scores of the players

getTurn(uint256).details: Returns the current turn of the game with the specified ID

returns._0: uint256 The current turn of the game

isGameOver(uint256).details: Returns whether the game with the specified ID is over

returns._0: bool Whether the game is over

isLastTurn(uint256).details: Returns whether the game with the specified ID is in the last turn

returns._0: bool Whether the game is in the last turn

isOvertime(uint256).details: Returns whether the game with the specified ID is in overtime

returns._0: bool Whether the game is in overtime

isPlayerTurnComplete(uint256,address).details: Returns whether the player has completed their turn in the game with the specified ID

returns._0: bool Whether the player has completed their turn

isRegistrationOpen(uint256).details: Returns whether registration is open for the game with the specified ID

joinGame(uint256).details: Allows a player to join a game with the provided game ID. `gameId` is the ID of the game.

leaveGame(uint256).details: Allows a player to leave a game with the provided game ID. `gameId` is the ID of the game.

openRegistration(uint256).details: Opens registration for a game with the provided game ID. `gameId` is the ID of the game.

startGame(uint256).details: Starts a game with the provided game ID early. `gameId` is the ID of the game.

devdoc.title: RankifyInstanceMainFacet

cancelGame(uint256).notice: This function:         - Calls the `enforceIsGameCreator` function with `msg.sender`.         - Cancels the game.         - Emits a _GameClosed_ event.

createGame((uint256,uint256,uint256,uint.notice: This function:         - Validates the contract is initialized         - Processes input parameters         - Creates a new game with specified settings

joinGame(uint256).notice: This function:         - Calls the `joinGame` function with `msg.sender`.         - Calls the `fund` function with `bytes32(gameId)`.         - Emits a _PlayerJoined_ event.

leaveGame(uint256).notice: This function:         - Calls the `quitGame` function with `msg.sender`, `true`, and `onPlayerQuit`.

openRegistration(uint256).notice: This function:         - Calls the `enforceIsGameCreator` function with `msg.sender`.         - Calls the `enforceIsPreRegistrationStage` function.         - Calls the `openRegistration` function.         - Emits a _RegistrationOpen_ event.

startGame(uint256).notice: This function:         - Calls the `enforceGameExists` function.         - Calls the `startGameEarly` function.         - Emits a _GameStarted_ event.

userdoc.notice: Main facet for the Rankify protocol that handles game creation and management
